name: The Pairing
description:
The Pairing

The fascinating beings known to us as the Quar'xin bind the fates of unsuspecting beings from seemingly arbitrary universes to each other. Often these brave souls are tied to one common destiny and so, they must achieve their own goals by working together - or they will perish together.

Can you aid the Bravest Knight rescue the fair Princess Zabia and by doing so, save the Great Kingdom and all its alliances?

Can you lead the Falcon-01 through the asteroid field in the Borgon Cluster, so that it may provide tactical support in time? Remember, their fates are no longer theirs alone.

Controls General Control Key Restarting
Space Tower Game Control Key Movement Left/Right Arrows Jumping Up/Down Arrows Space Game Control Key Movement Arrow keys About the game

Made with love for the Two Games Jam 2021.

Each game is uploaded separately as well, if you're interested in playing one of those click below ⬇

  • Space Game
  • Tower Game
Credits

Thanks to Antti Luode for the musical piece "Aloude Tunefish" 🤍
